school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: I\'m first year student taking accounting at open university of Tanzania . From the very first time I watched your accounting lecture on yutube about intermidiate accounting , it helped me so much and still help me alot . I like you professor more than I can explain for the assistance you are giving me and not only me also my colleges . GOD BLESS YU

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: This professor has a great knowledge of the profession

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: I had Professor Bloch for my first two semesters of accounting and was impressed by her knowledgeability in the field of accounting but if you don\'t sit at the front of class then you will have a much more difficult time. Her tests were very difficult with many trick questions but I\'m glad I started off accounting with a tough professor.

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: Ok. I really can\'t stand her voice (too Long Island for me) and she spoke entirely too fast. Slow down, it\'s not a race.

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: She is awesome! took her over the summer and loved her. She was very clear and fully taught the material. She really wanted the students to learn and has a good sense of humor! Great with answering questions and is understanding. Def take her! I wish I could have her for every math related class I take!

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: She is very friendly, but really tough. There were 2 tests, and the comprehensive final really hard, challenging, and tricky. She uses a different textbook on her slides and exams than is required, but according to her you must read the required one. You have to spend many hours studying everywhere. Don\'t take her if you are not into hard work.

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: Taking over the summer. A lot of work but this professor really wants you to learn and will take the time to teach. Long, hard tests but if you take the time to study you will pass. Be prepared to spend lots of time at home doing hw/studying.

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: She makes her exams entirely too difficult and believes it humorous. Don\'t take her be any means necessary, you have to devote too much time toward her class in the mist of a rigorous accounting major curriculum.

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: She is the best!! When I grw up, I wanna be just like her..lmao!! I didnt get an A, and I studied mao!! But I learned a lot!!, She is sho nice, and helpful..and a fair grader. You really need to spend a lot of ur time doing problems, I was taking Int acc1,wrkng ft, and partying every week, so I couldnt study that much.But she deserves an A++

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: she is very nice but if she has to fail u she will do it. If you are a student that does not work, have a social live, or family I will recommend this professor to you because all you need to do is practice 24 hrs a day from her website practice 4 preformance and you will pass her exam with A but if you work or have a family dont take.

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: One of my favorite teachers at Rutgers!! She explains topics clearly and was very helpful if we didn\'t understand something. Tests weren\'t easy but not too difficult if you study.

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: AVOID! do not take her. SLow with responding to emails and she cant teach for****. She is an excellent accountant but not a good teacher

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: She is hard, puts tricky questions on the exams, doesn\'t reply to ANY emails and thinks its funny. She is not a good professor.... AVOID

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: She\'s good, but went way too far with that mandatory PWC presentation which took forever. Exams are hard and she is not cooperative about the grades if the scanner marks a wrong answer by mistake (happened to a lot of ppl) and yes my average was right 80 and she gave me a C+.

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: CQM is a hard class, but this professor is really great at teaching. Take lots of notes and ask questions if you are stuck. Her test are very similar to notes so just study them. She really takes the time to teach you everything. One of the best professor Rutgers has.

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: She explains very well. Tests are not hard, just do the practice test and homework and you will be fine. Homework is not graded, she just checks if you did it or not. Great prof.

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: Blotch is amazing. She tries hard to have the class understand the material. Also, she is fair on grading. If your the type of person that gets away with cheating, u won\'t get away with it in this class, trust me. However, I highly recommend her.

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: The course itself is pretty dry, no matter who you take it with but Blotch always showed enthusiasm which kept the class awaktheIrs about tine the rutgers business school finally made a smart desicion on a teacher. Blotch is the best. Highly recommend her to everyone.

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: Amazing Professor! One of the best professors I had at Rutgers. I hated CQM prior to attending her class. But I learned a lot and the exams were not too bad. Homeworks and Attendance mandatory. Take her if you want to learn stuff and if u put in in a little effort its a easy A!
